text: keeping this top of mind until inbound.

<https://spin.d.pr/2Zyg5H+>
would be nice if there was less padding on the line numbers for code editors in the right panel.
I get that it’s there to accomodate if you get to 3 digit line numbers but - if you scroll that far looking in that little window. you’re either a fan of torturing yourself, or the glorious expand button isn’t obvious to you.

#lessPaddingMeansSlightlyLessWrapping
